name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Engineer - AI Solutions with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance, specializing in **generative AI**, **agentic AI**, and **deep learning** technologies. Proficient in **Python**, **C++**, and **Java**, with experience in frameworks and tools such as **FastAPI**, **LangChain**, **LangGraph**, and **LlamaIndex**. Demonstrated expertise in building cloud-native applications across **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, and integrating cutting-edge technologies such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for MLOps workflows.

Skilled in developing and deploying intelligent solutions that leverage **RAG** and **ONNX** for optimized model performance. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, coupled with effective business communication skills in both verbal and written English. Dedicated to creating secure, maintainable systems that enhance real-world impact while adhering to compliance standards, with a robust background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation.
